COURT NO. 10 a

The Honourable Mr Justice N. ANAND VENKATESH

TO BE HEARD THROUGH VIDEO CONFERENCING / PHYSICAL MODE / HYBRID MODE ON WEDNESDAY THE 11TH DAY OF JUNE 2025 - AT 10:30 A.M.(Motion List) - 6.COURT LINK ALSO AVAILABLE IN https://www.mhc.tn.gov.in/vclink ==================================================================================== (a). ADMISSION CASES WILL BE LISTED DAILY AND IF ANY CASE IS NOT LISTED AND IT HAS ALREADY BEEN NUMBERED, ADVOCATES SHALL FURNISH THE WRIT PETITION NUMBER TO THE COURT OFFICER. (b). WRIT PETITION UP TO THE YEAR 2020 WILL BE LISTED EVERY MONDAY FOR FINAL HEARING. (c). WRIT PETITION OF THE YEARS 2021 and 2022 WILL BE LISTED EVERY TUESDAY FOR FINAL HEARING. (d). WRIT PETITION OF THE YEAR 2023 WILL BE LISTED EVERY WEDNESDAY FOR FINAL HEARING. (e). WRIT PETITION OF THE YEARS 2024 and 2025 WILL BE LISTED EVERY THURSDAY and FRIDAY FOR FINAL HEARING. (f). IN THOSE CASES TO BE LISTED UNDER THE CAPTION "FOR BEING MENTIONED" AND "FOR EXTENSION OF INTERIM ORDERS", THE ADVOCATES ARE DIRECTED TO CIRCULATE THE NUMBER TO THE COURT OFFICER AND IT WILL BE IMMEDIATELY LISTED. (g). ADVOCATES WHO WANT THEIR CASES TO BE LISTED, SHALL PROVIDE THE CASE DETAILS IN THE NOTE BOOK THAT WILL BE MADE AVAILABLE WITH THE COURT OFFICER "FROM 10:30 A.M. TO 11:30 A.M." DAILY. ALL THOSE CASES WILL BE LISTED YEAR WISE ON THE DAYS ALLOTTED FOR THOSE RESPECTIVE YEARS AND (h). THE ADVOCATES ARE REQUESTED TO MENTION ONLY URGENT CASES WHICH REQUIRE IMMEDIATE LISTING FOR ADMISSION. INSOFAR AS OTHER CASES, THE INSTRUCTIONS GIVEN 'SUPRA' SHALL BE STRICTLY FOLLOWED. ====================================================================================
